Introduction.name: Vasanthakumar Durairaj
Introduction.body: A software developer building end-to-end solutions using JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

About.title: About Me
About.paragraph-1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer who builds end-to-end web applications using modern JavaScript technologies.
About.paragraph-2: I focus on creating clean, scalable, and user-friendly applications by working across both front-end and back-end layers. I enjoy solving real-world problems and turning ideas into working products.
About.paragraph-3: I work with Next.js, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS, and I’m comfortable handling APIs, authentication, database design, and deployment workflows.
About.paragraph-4: I enjoy understanding how systems work internally and building projects that are reliable, maintainable, and performance-focused.
About.paragraph-5: Outside of coding, I enjoy learning new technologies, improving my problem-solving skills, and continuously growing as a developer.

watch.title: VEERAA WATCH
watch.description: A responsive video streaming web app inspired by YouTube. Built using React JS, React Router, authentication, protected routes, and API integration with a clean UI.

hrms_model.title: HRMS Model App (Company Assignment)
hrms_model.description: A company assignment project built based on the required features: JWT token authentication, clean REST API integration, employee management, team tracking, complete CRUD operations, and a welcome dashboard. Developed as a complete full-stack application with both frontend and backend using Supabase for database + API handling.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Web Application
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with product listings, authentication, cart functionality, admin dashboard, and payment flow integration.

assees.title: Veeraa-Assess Web App
assees.description: Assess App is a React-based assessment platform with JWT authentication and a built-in timer, providing a secure, responsive, and reliable environment for managing exams and protecting assessment data.

more.text: You can find more projects and source code on my GitHub profile.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.intro: If you’d like to collaborate or discuss an opportunity,
Contact.cta: you can reach me via email or through the links below.

bullets: Designed and developed full-stack applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Implemented authentication, REST APIs, database schemas, and deployment workflows.
Focused on performance optimization, clean UI, and maintainable code structure.
Learned full-stack development through hands-on projects and structured courses.
Built multiple practice applications to strengthen front-end and back-end skills.
Improved problem-solving by working on real-world inspired features.
